title: A feature in Netsuite Reports > Financial > Balance Sheet-CarlZeng
excerpt: 最新版本的Customize balance sheet pageLeft side > Layout > Add Reference RowThen in right side, you were able to specify a custom or standard REPORT value....
content:
最新版本的Customize balance sheet pageLeft side > Layout > Add Reference RowThen in right side, you were able to specify a custom or standard REPORT value….

最新版本的Customize balance sheet page

Left side > Layout > Add Reference Row

Then in right side, you were able to specify a custom or standard REPORT value. (linking new report)

　　- In the Row field, specify the sub row base on specified report

这个troubleshoot过程，比较复杂得要一步步熟悉custom parent report的设置和内部关联！isolated过程可以持续几个小时。。。:(

Note: 

这样父子的Report，就关联起来，当然跑parent report的时候，后台肯定要使用权限运行子报表。

不然有概率会出现错误：Report Execution Error

Note:
